SEARCH
Module org.hdfgroup.hdfview
Package hdf.view.TableView

Class DefaultTableViewFactory

Object
hdf.view.DataView.DataViewFactory
hdf.view.TableView.TableViewFactory
hdf.view.TableView.DefaultTableViewFactory
public class DefaultTableViewFactory extends TableViewFactory
A simple Factory class which returns concrete instances of the default TableView, based on whether the data object to be viewed is a scalar or compound dataset or is an attribute.
Version:
1.0 4/18/2018
Author:
jhenderson
